Package jv.thirdParty.expr

Expression parser for mathematical functions.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Expr
    A mathematical expression, built out of literal numbers, variables, arithmetic operators, and elementary functions.
    Parser
    Parses strings representing mathematical formulas with variables.
    PerThreadHashtable
    Thread-Local hash table.
    Variable
    Variables associate values with names.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Syntax_error
    Syntax error exception thrown by function parser.

Package jv.thirdParty.expr Description

Expression parser for mathematical functions.

The package jv.function provides wrapper function classes with inspectors for interactive editing.
